name: Dr Jerrard Huffman
description: Dr Huffman is well known worldwidely due to his long research in related to health and human life style. his publications are more than a couple of hundreds and his role in our team is to study individual profiles and advise the team with latest scientific methods in regards to the health and lifestyle of individual customers

name: Dr Helen Jackson
description: Graduated from Hrvard University with with the most prestigous grade. She is known for her alter-carb program for weight controle and healthy diet.

name: Dr Noah Bernhard
description: He is one of the most prestigous member of the team. His international experience in five continents brought him a vast knowledge of dite and living condition of the people around the world. He has speciality in diabetic and special needs and diets.

name: Maya Wang
description: Maya has great reputation in nutrition, body measurements and anatomical frame. Her unique methods are published in several books. She is able to study body type of individuals and prescribe according to that completely out of the box. She has her higher education from Cambridge in biology, phisiology and nnutrition

name: Dr Emma Hook
description: Emma is a genious physical training scientist who is well reputed in athletic world, Olympic games and anongst physiotharapists. She has invented a few methods that can improve methabolism of individuals and making them more efficient in burning extra colloris and staying fresh.
